name: Oneiroi
description:
In Oneiroi, play as an insomniac traveling through dream worlds in which dwell the Oneiroi, children of the night, messengers of the gods and personifications of the subsconscious mind..

Will you face your fears... Or plunge deeper into them?

Oneiroi is an illustrated interactive fiction game that is best enjoyed with several playthroughs.

CREDITS

  • Game Design, Writing & Photography: Sofia Romualdo
  • Assistant Photographer: Eric Stein
  • Music: Wow Sound
  • Additional Photos: Envato Elements
